title: Live The Life You Love At Arras!
posting_body: ['Arras', '12282 Northeast 12th Lane, Bellevue, WA, 98005', 'Want more information?', 'Follow this link:', '<URL>', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'Seize the adventure of life at Arras', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 849 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Seize the adventure of life at Arras – centrally located in Bellevue’s up-and-coming Spring District.', 'With three buildings around a courtyard, Arras is a vibrant, welcoming community that offers sophisticated details and quality finishes in bright, airy apartment homes.', 'Minutes from downtown Bellevue and a short trip to Seattle attractions, live at the gateway to the Pacific Northwest’s outdoor paradise, with easy access to the slopes, the surf and everything in between.', 'Features', '- Quartz Countertops', '- Gas Range *', '- Kitchen Island with Pendant Lighting *', '- FiberInternet, Direct to Each Apartment', '- Designer Finishes', '- Balcony or Deck *', '- Full-Sized, Quality Appliances', '- Full-Size Washer and Dryer', '- Stainless Steel Appliances', '- Open Floor Plan', '*Only available in select units', 'Community Amenities', '- Pedal Club: Game Room with TV & bike Repair Stand', '- The Lodge: Top-Floor Resident Lounge', '- Conference Room & Co-Working Spaces', '- EV Charging Stations Available', '- Pet Washing Station', '- Permanent Art Installations', '- The Hub + The Perch: Gourmet Kitchen', '- Assigned Parking Available – (additional fee)', '- Club Fitness: 2 levels with Peloton, Weights & Cardio', '- Friendly On-Site Management and Maintenance', '- Sky Deck: Rooftop Deck with Fire Pit', '- Courtyard with Landscaping', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday: 9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Saturday: 10:00AM-5:00PM', 'Sunday: 10:00AM-5:00PM', 'We do not accept Comprehensive Reusable Tenant Screening Reports as defined by and pursuant to RCW 59.18.', '9KEY0lYYBc']
